post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Senior Java Developer :.

Status:  Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project        

Senior Java Developer

We need strong software engineers to assist in building enterprise wide
application framework. The work requires strong understanding of software
engineering principles in distributed software technologies, object oriented
technologies, security and large scale data processing techniques.

About Acumen:
Founded in 1998 and located in Toronto, Acumen뭩 development and consulting
teams have gained recognition for their expertise in high-profile
infrastructure development. Our core expertise is based on Web Services
Standards, Connectivity, Collaboration and Enterprise Security.

Location:
Toronto, Ontario.

Description:
* In this position you will be required to understand high level design and
produce detail design in UML and implement and test the final design. The
project is for a large retail US client. Development will be done in Acumen
office in Toronto.
* This position starts on a contract basis and has an option to become permanent.

Requirements:
Must have:
* A minimum of 3 years of Java and J2EE experience
* Good Communication Skills
* Strong background in Object Oriented Software development
* Strong background in modeling using UML
* Professional experience using WebLogic Server
* Solid understanding of web technologies like XML, HTML, JSP, Javascript
* University degree in a related discipline or equivalent experience.

Nice to have:
* Experience with the Struts Framework
* Be able to travel to the US.

Only applicants that have been retained will be contacted. Selected
applicants will have to take Acumen designed Java test before qualifying for
interviews. Interested applicants are invited to submit their resume
online at jobs@acumentechnologies.com


Contact Information :.
Nahid Keshmirshekan
jobs@acumentechnologies.com
Acumen Advanced Technologies
Toronto ON
Ph: 416-491-1419 x220
post.title: GTA-Senior Java Developer (from Monster.ca)
